page.title: 04CHANGES IN NORTH HAYLING
page.content: We asked each household if there had been any major changes.72 people said yes and 49 said no. About one quarter (140) replied.Over forty people said that there haven't been any changes whilst they have been living there. 22 people said the traffic has increased a lot,and many roads have been changed to cope with the traffic.49 people said that houses and new buildings are being built everywhere.4 people wrote N/A.4 people said that two shops had been closed.2 people said that carparks had changed. The following categories were mentioned by 1 person: Northney common had been changed;the Old Billy Railway had been closed; all the flowers had gone;that business had come to the area;Post House hotel had opened; Northney Marina had opened;More enjoyment.
